root.name: Caesar's Palace
root.description: Caesar's Palace is a 1992 casino simulation developed by Realtime Associates and published by Virgin Games. The game is based on the Caesar's Palace casino in Las Vegas. The player starts out with $1000 in chips, and the game is essentially open ended from there. The player can play a variety of casino games, and also visit the restroom or cash out at any time. Featured GamesRouletteBlackjackSlot Machines In the mid-to-late 90s a 16-bit version of the game was released for the SNES and Genesis. In addition to improved graphics, this version of the game also included an expanded list of games. Featured Games SlotsRouletteBlackjackVideo PokerCrapsRed Dog (Draw two cards, bet on whether the third pick is in the middle)
